message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to let it go for a great price. I'm offering it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $100 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway and offer the product for $140. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $120 is still a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer the product for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $130 is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make one more compromise. I can offer the product for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $125 is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm not sure I can go any lower. I can offer the product for $122. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal!
